Liz MacHaffie

I’m Liz. I’m thrilled to bring my behavior and psychology knowledge to front-end development. It’s fascinating to think about the interactions between our minds and a program’s design and behaviors. Before diving in to the development field, I was an animal trainer and behaviorist.

Development gives me a way to meaningfully contribute to improving lives through technology. I'm particularly interested in animals, science, education, and health.

When I'm not working, I love rock climbing, dog training, and cooking healthy foods!
